text:
Senior Project Manager - Digital Transformation

TechGlobal Solutions is seeking an experienced Senior Project Manager to lead digital transformation initiatives.

Location: Dubai, UAE
Salary: $130,000 - $160,000

Requirements:
• 8+ years project management experience
• PMP certification required
• Bachelor's degree required, MBA preferred
• Experience with banking/financial services
• Strong agile and stakeholder management skills
• Experience with Jira and cloud technologies

Program Manager - Cloud Migration

CloudFirst Consulting is hiring a Program Manager for large-scale cloud migration projects.

Location: Riyadh, Saudi Arabia

Requirements:
• 10+ years in program management
• Cloud certifications (AWS/Azure)
• Experience with DevOps and CI/CD
• Financial services experience
• Arabic language skills preferred

IT Project Coordinator

SmallTech LLC needs an IT Project Coordinator for internal software projects.

Location: Remote

Requirements:
• 2-3 years experience
• Basic project management knowledge
• Familiar with agile methodologies
• Good communication skills
